Recipe.title: Coconut Almond Popcorn
Recipe.Source: Not sure where we got this recipe.
Recipe.Description: When settling down to watch a movie, popcorn is a great treat. But it is a little plain. This recipe adds a salty-sweet, tangy taste to it that is awesome!

section.instruction: Pop Popcorn and place in a large bowl. (For best results, use a hot air-popper.)
In a heavy pan, on high heat, melt Butter or Margarine.
While it is melting, add White Corn Syrup.

After it has melted, add:
Sugar
Salt
Stirring occasionally, bring to a boil and boil for 3-5 Minutes.

Remove from heat and stir in:
Baking Soda
Vanilla
Almond Extract
Add Shredded Coconut and Sliced Almonds, then stir lightly.

Notes.note: In step 5, the longer you boil the mixture the harder the caramel will be in the end. The shorter you boil it, the more gooey it will be.
Be careful when stirring in the last step because the coating is VERY hot and can cause nasty burns!
